attributes.action: recognise the new scottish first minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a labour supporter and head of a family which has always voted labour< I find it shameful that neither the Prime Minister nor Gordon Brown have it within themselves to congratulate Mr Salmond and then get on with the business of ensuring good governance of Scotland. Mr Blair recently shook hands with men who a few years ago could not be called democrats. Mr Brown has rightly congratulated the Welsh 1st minister. Can they not recognise Salmond in the same way.
Its embarrassing and not the way social democrats should act.
